Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AggregateSwitch
    This class represents an Aggregate Switch in a Datacenter network.
    AppCloudlet
    AppCloudlet class represents an application that an user submits for execution within a datacenter and is consisted of several NetworkCloudlets.
    CloudletExecutionTask
    Represents a processing task that can be executed by a NetworkCloudlet.
    CloudletReceiveTask
    Represents a task executed by a NetworkCloudlet that receives data from a CloudletSendTask.
    CloudletSendTask
    Represents a task executed by a NetworkCloudlet that sends data to a CloudletReceiveTask.
    CloudletTask
    Represents one of many tasks that can be executed by a NetworkCloudlet.
    EdgeSwitch
    This class represents an Edge Switch in a Datacenter network.
    HostPacket
    HostPacket represents the packet that travels through the virtual network within a Host.
    NetDatacenterBroker
    NetDatacentreBroker is a DatacenterBroker implementation that works with network components such as NetworkDatacenter, NetworkHost and NetworkVm.
    NetworkCloudlet
    NetworkCloudlet class extends Cloudlet to support simulation of complex applications.
    NetworkCloudletSpaceSharedScheduler
    NetworkCloudletSchedulerSpaceShared implements a policy of scheduling performed by a virtual machine to run its NetworkCloudlet's.
    NetworkDatacenter
    NetworkDatacenter class is a Datacenter whose hostList are virtualized and networked.
    NetworkHost
    NetworkHost class extends HostSimple to support simulation of networked datacenters.
    NetworkPacket
    NewtorkPacket represents the packet which travel from one server to another.
    NetworkVm
    NetworkVm class extends VmSimple to support simulation of networked datacenters.
    NetworkVmAllocationPolicy
    NetworkVmAllocationPolicy is an VmAllocationPolicy that chooses, as the host for a VM, that one with less PEs in use.
    RootSwitch
    This class allows to simulate Root switch which connects Datacenters to external network.
    Switch
    Represents a Network Switch.
